General.Name: Kretam Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Kretam Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the operation of oil palm plantations in Malaysia, Singapore, China, India, Germany, Spain, Italy, and the Netherlands. The company operates through two segments: Plantation and Mill, and Refinery. The Plantation and Mill segment cultivates and sells oil palm products. The Refinery segment refines and sells crude palm oils; and produces and sells palm methyl ester. The company also involved in the provision of plantation management and related services, data processing services, and property letting activities; operation of biogas power plant; manufacturing, granulating, blending, distribution, and sale of fertilizers; and manufacture of bio-organic fertilizers. Kretam Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Sandakan, Malaysia.
